text: Ganga Pushkaram is a festival of River Ganga which normally occurs once in 12 years. This Pushkaram is observed for a period of 12 days from the time of entry of Jupiter into Aswini nakshatra Mesha rasi (Aries). == See also == *Kumbh Mela *Godavari Pushkaram *Pushkaram ==References== Category:Cultural festivals in India Category:Water and Hinduism Category:Hindu festivals Category:Religious tourism in India Category:Hindu pilgrimages Category:Ganges Category:Religious festivals in India
title: Ganga Pushkaram
